alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:40PM MST until January 21 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation of freezing rain and occasional snow. Ice accumulations around one tenth up to two tenths of an inch. Snow accumulations of less than one inch in valleys. * WHERE...Genesee, Fourth Of July Pass, St. Maries, Pinehurst, Potlatch, Osburn, Mullan, Dobson Pass, Wallace, Moscow, Lookout Pass, Kellogg, Plummer, and Fernwood. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher accumulation of ice expected in elevations below 3500 feet where temperatures remain below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.
